tool_description: Converts assembled invoice data into various output formats including PDF, HTML, XML, and plain text for different delivery and storage requirements.

invoice_data.description: Complete invoice data structure to convert

output_format.description: Desired output format (PDF, HTML, XML, TXT, JSON)

error_messages: Invalid output format: Specified format is not supported. Use PDF, HTML, XML, TXT, or JSON.
Invoice data malformed: Invoice data structure is invalid or corrupted. Provide valid invoice data.
Conversion failed: Unable to convert to specified format. Check data integrity and format compatibility.
Quality setting invalid: Quality setting must be draft, standard, or high. Choose a valid quality option.
usage: Provide complete invoice_data and specify the desired output_format. Optionally set quality_setting for output optimization. The tool returns the invoice in the requested format.

formatted_invoice.description: Invoice converted to the requested format

file_size.description: Size of the formatted output in bytes

format_metadata.description: Metadata about the formatting process and settings used
